summary: After undergoing a number of personal crises, a stand-up comic returns to the stage for a one-man show featuring stinging social commentary and very personal reflections about his life.
cast: Martin Lawrence|Nancy O'Dell|Paul Keeley|Art Cohan|Renato Powell|Mikki Padilla|Christopher Halsted|Dayna Devon|Kris Carraway-Bowman|Kevin Carter
keywords: stand up|four word title|colon in title|actor name in title|satire
title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
